details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.5 Extended graphics state - TR key
details.description: A graphics state parameter dictionary (ISO 32000-2:2020, 8.4.5) shall not contain the TR key

rule.description: A graphics state parameter dictionary (ISO 32000-2:2020, 8.4.5) shall not contain the TR key

error.message: A graphics state parameter dictionary contains the TR key
